abstract.text: An object that renders an image from bitmap data.
An object that stores color data and sometimes opacity (alpha value).
A high-level interface for manipulating image data.
The component values defining a color in a specific color space.
A representation of an image to be processed or produced by Core Image filters.
An object representing a static ordered collection, for use instead of an  constant in cases that require reference semantics.
An object representing a static collection of key-value pairs, for use instead of a  constant in cases that require reference semantics.
An object wrapper for primitive scalar numeric values.
A static, plain-text Unicode string object which you use when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.
Allow users to browse, edit, and save images, using slideshows and Core Image filters.
A layer that loads, plays, and controls Quartz Composer compositions in a Core Animation layer hierarchy.
The
protocol defines the methods used to pass data to the input ports or retrieve data from the output ports of the root patch of a Quartz Composer composition. This protocol is adopted by the
, and
classes.
Sets the value for an input port of a composition.
Returns the value for an input port of a composition.
Returns the value for an output port of a composition.
Returns the current value on an output port (identified by its key) of the root patch of the composition.
A base class for low-level rendering.
The
class is a custom
class that loads, plays, and controls Quartz Composer compositions. It is an autonomous view that is driven by an internal timer running on the main thread.
A static, plain-text Unicode string object which you use when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
